name: ORDER_RPTD_SIG_PRNRSN
description: For each row in ORDER_RPTD_SIG_HX where a PRN (as needed) frequency is used, this table contains the list of PRN reasons that were selected, if any.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with why a medication is marked PRN.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of PRN Reasons within this record.

columns.name: PRN_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The frequency PRN (as needed) reason category ID indicating the reasons the medication should be given on an as-needed basis.
